button.confirm: Are you sure you want to start the process?
button.name: set_to_start

button.confirm: No adjustment is allowed after clicking “Ok”?
button.name: set_to_admitted

button.confirm: Are you sure you want to discharge the patient?
button.name: set_to_discharged

button.confirm: Are you sure you want to back to Admitted?
button.name: back_to_admitted

group.p: Mark on the body chart deformities or join anomalies, back deformities or anomalies, edema, shoulder subluxation etc.
SIN: severe,irritable,nature ROM: range of motion EOR: end of range MOMP: momentary pain

page.h2: Passive ROM should be recorded during first assessment and before discharging the patients:
Muscle test should be recorded during first assessment and before discharging the patient:

group.h3:
QUOTATION FOR MUSCLE TESTING
according to Manual Muscle Testing Oxford Scale
0- No contraction present
1- Contraction visible without movement
2- Movement possible without gravity or incomplete against gravity
3- Movement possible against gravity into the fullest available range
4- Movement possible against gravity and an added moderate resistance
5- Muscle functions nomally

QUOTATION FOR MUSCLE TESTING
according to Manual Muscle Testing Oxford Scale
0- No increase in tone
1- Slight increase in tone giving a catch when limb is moved
2- More marked increase in tone
3- Considerable increase in tone - passive movement difficult
4- Limb rigid
